content.question:
"Aspera tum positis mitescent saecula bellis:

cana Fides et Vesta, Remo cum fratre Quirinus

iura dabunt; dirae ferro et compagibus artis

claudentur Belli portae; Furor impius intus

(5) saeva sedens super arma et centum vinctus aenis

post tergum nodis fremet horridus ore cruento."

Aeneid 1.291-296

In the passage above, Jupiter describes Rome's future. In a short essay, discuss how he characterizes this period in Rome's history. Be sure to refer specifically to the Latin throughout the passage to support the points you make in your essay.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 3.A: Develop an interpretation of a Latin text.
